title: 0.14.0 mobile release
body:
issue to manage mobile 0.14.0 release

- open issues and PRs for release: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/labels/release
- release notes to be added: https://notes.status.im/mobile-release-notes
- release branch:   
- compare 0.12.x and 0.14.0:  
Expected feature freeze date:  
Expected release date:  

### Testing info
- Build X to test: 
- Test plan for build X:

### Build numbers in TestFlight and PlayStore to push as a release
- TestFlight:  
- PlayStore:  

### Links for stable page update:
DIAWI:  
APK:  
IOS:  

Steps:
- [x] (optional) Update the release schedule https://status.im/mobile-release-schedule/ (status.im/source/mobile-release-schedule/index.md)
- [ ] Create 0.13.0 release branch and get successful builds (so, testing can be started)
- [ ] Submit iOS build to Apple review
- [ ] Create release notes
- [ ] Regression testing for release candidate build
- [ ] Fix known blocker(s) found during regression testing
- [ ] Cherry pick fix(es) to the release branch
- [ ] Verify fix(es) on new release candidate build
- [ ] Retest
- [ ] Battery consumption testing
- [ ] Update description for final release build on PlayStore and TestFlight
- [ ] Get exact versions of the tested final release build from test team to update website links 
- [ ] Update status.im/stable page with artefacts for mobile release (ipa, apk and diawi links)
- [ ] Get links to release artefacts to update stable page
- [ ] Update cn.status.im with release apk link
- [ ] Get exact versions of the tested final release build from test team and push them as release
- [ ] notify marketing to push comms

Post release steps:
- [ ] Update PlayStore Screenshots if significant feature is added or existing Screenshots are no longer same as in previous version
